title: Riot support replies
body: Hi, I was wondering whether somebody knows how quickly does Riot answer Riot support tickets. I feel slightly ignored as my ticket is still unanswered after a day.

replies.body: Depends on where it's being fielded, but we try to get back as soon as we can.  Our volumes are a bit higher right now due to the personalized shop issue, but toss me your ticket number and I'd be happy to check on the status for you.
